sourcesContent: import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormArray, FormControl, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { ActivatedRoute, Params } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-edit', templateUrl: './recipe-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-edit.component.css'] }) export class RecipeEditComponent implements OnInit{ constructor(private route:ActivatedRoute){}; recipeId!:number; isEdit:boolean = true; recipeForm:FormGroup = new FormGroup({ name: new FormControl(null,[Validators.required]), imageURL: new FormControl(null,[Validators.required]), description: new FormGroup(null,[Validators.required]), ingredients: new FormArray([]) }) getIngredientsControlArray(){ return (this.recipeForm.get('ingredients') as FormArray).controls; } addIngredientControl(){ (this.recipeForm.get("ingredients") as FormArray).push(new FormControl({ name:null, amount:null })) } ngOnInit(): void { this.route.params.subscribe((param:Params)=>{ this.recipeId = param['id']; this.isEdit = param['id'] != undefined; }) } }
